TELEMETRY REF CS_COMMANDERROR BIG_ENDIAN "The Command Sequencer issued a command and received an error status in return."
    # User defined file, fill in your deployment's common event items here
    APPEND_ITEM SYNC 72 STRING "Sync pattern"  
    APPEND_ITEM LENGTH 32 UINT "Telemetry length"
    APPEND_ID_ITEM DESC 32 UINT 2 "Descriptor always 2 for EVR's"  
    APPEND_ID_ITEM EVR_ID 32 UINT 551 "EVR ID"
    APPEND_ITEM TIME_BASE 16 UINT "Time Base"
    APPEND_ITEM TIME_CONTEXT 8 UINT "Time Context"
    APPEND_ITEM SECS 32 UINT "Seconds"
    APPEND_ITEM USECS 32 UINT "Microseconds"

    APPEND_ITEM FILENAME_LENGTH 16 UINT "Length of String Arg"
    APPEND_ITEM FILENAME 0 STRING "The name of the sequence file"
    ITEM RECORDNUMBER -96 32 UINT "The record number"
    ITEM OPCODE -64 32 UINT "The opcode"
    ITEM ERRORSTATUS -32 32 UINT "The error status"

    ITEM MESSAGE 0 0 DERIVED "Formatted String for Argument"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf("Sequence file %s: Command %d (opcode %d) completed with error %d" , packet.read('fileName') , packet.read('recordNumber') , packet.read('opCode') , packet.read('errorStatus') )
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
    ITEM EVR_SEVERITY 0 0 DERIVED "Severity"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf('WARNING_HI')
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
